1. Who is facing assault and harassment charges?
Jonathan Majors
2. What did Jonathan Majors' lawyer say about his involvement in the incident?
Majors is innocent and was the actual victim
3. When was Jonathan Majors arraigned in a New York City courtroom?
Sunday
4. What charges is Jonathan Majors facing?
Assault, attempted assault, harassment, and aggravated harassment
5. What did the victim tell police about the alleged incident?
Majors struck her about the face, causing pain and a laceration, grabbed her hand causing swelling and bruising, and put his hand on her neck causing bruising and pain
6. What did the judge grant along with releasing Majors on his own recognizance?
A limited order of protection
7. When is Jonathan Majors' next court appearance scheduled?
May 8
8. What did Majors' lawyer, Priya Chaudhry, say about evidence in the case?
Video and witness evidence will clear her client and the alleged victim has recanted her allegations
9. Why did Chaudhry say the woman involved in the incident was in an emotional crisis?
Majors had been the one to call 911
10. In which movies has Jonathan Majors recently appeared?
Creed III as Damian Anderson and Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania as Kang the Conqueror
